Charge.Enable(s) Comment: Both 'AmpPowerEnable' and 'FifteenVPowerEnable' need to be set to 'y' for AmpOffset and Bias values to take effect.

Phonon.ADCSignal Comment: source: n=feedback amp output, y=preamp output

TestSignal.QETTestSelect Comment: RevD HV: Use [0] for DCRC0, [1] for DCRC1
TestSignal.GeneratorEnable Comment: If using L1Trigger (instead of LegacyTrigger), you might also want to set 'Settings/L1Trigger/DCRCX/Enable test signal trigger'

DCRC0.ChannelIndex Comment: Index channel goes from 0 to 31, 0 for channel 0 of first slot, 31 for channel 7 of fourth slot
DCRC0.Prebias and run voltage comment: Prebias Voltage/time and Run Voltage are not used by the HVDriver. They are for human reference only!!!

DCRC1.ChannelIndex Comment: Index channel goes from 0 to 31, 0 for channel 0 of first slot, 31 for channel 7 of fourth slot
DCRC1.Prebias and run voltage comment: Prebias Voltage/time and Run Voltage are not used by the HVDriver. They are for human reference only!!!
